item.title: About Me
item.description:
Shu Xinyu
1995/04/21
shuxy0421@163.com

Skills

Golang(Familiar) —— Backend development

  • Beego
  • MySQL
  • Redis
  • Nginx
  • Docker
  • Linux

Python(Familiar) —— Machine Learning & Computer Vision

  • Numpy
  • Pandas
  • Scikit-Learn
  • Matplotlib
  • TensorFlow
  • OpenCV

Education

  • Jinan University    Computer Science and Technology     Master     2017 ~ 2019
  • Anhui University of Technology     Computer Science and Information Engineering    Bachelor      2013 ~ 2017

Working Experience

  • Shenzhen Mingtong Technology Co. Ltd.  Jul 2019 ~ Present
    • Summarize and design specific solutions to problems
    • Responsible for the realization of computer vision related models
    • Participate in rural contour recognition projects, responsible for image processing, scheme design and deep learning model building&training
    • Participate in the Location Based Service outdoor positioning project, responsible for POI data cleaning, mathematical analysis and result visualization.
  • Big Data Decision Institute (part-time)  Jul 2018 ~ Oct 2018
    • Collection and reading of the latest literature in the medical field
    • Participate in the research of personalized algorithms in the intelligent medical module, solve the problem of accurate division of similar people
    • Solve the problem of unstable effects of traditional clustering algorithms, design personalized clustering algorithms
    • Improve the personalized matching framework of medical patients, use transfer learning to solve the small sample set modeling’s overfitting problem

Project Experience

  • Rural contour recognition  Nov 2019 ~ Apr 2020
    • Use a pre-trained AlexNet network + image block structure training architecture to locate the specific location of the rural area while maximizing the ratio of the rural area to the candidate area.
    • openCV finds rural contour coordinates and outlines rural areas.
    • Design irregular IOU calculation method and estimate the performance interval of the model through multiple trials.
    • Integrated package of rural area detection and contour extraction
  • LBS outdoor positioning   Aug 2019 ~ Dec 2019
    • Use the Isolated Forest algorithm to delete the sample points of abnormal signal fluctuations to improve the robustness of the model.
    • Comparing the performance advantages of linear algorithm and tree algorithm.
    • Using the properties of the perpendicular and the Pythagorean theorem to find the expression of the solution of the three-point positioning equation.
    • Longitude and latitude information + folium scatter plot to visualize the positioning results
  • Mobile communication base station classification (participation) Apr 2020 ~ May 2020
    • Design a picture crawler program based on the selenium framework to increase the total amount of training data
    • Implement SPP-Net Layer to solve the problem of inconsistent picture size during training

Competition Experience

  • Alibaba Tianchi Big Data Competition-“Meinian Health AI Competition-Double High Disease Risk Prediction”  Top3%  Apr 2018 ~ May 2018
  • DataCastle competition-“National Energy Day New PV Power Forecasting Competition”  Top5%  Oct 2018 ~ Nov 2018
